scripts.dist:xz:bin: dist:bin && cd dist && tar -cJf application.binary.xz application
scripts.dist:xz: tar -cJf application.xz node_modules index.js package.json package-lock.json && mkdir -p dist && mv application.xz dist/
scripts.dist:xz:source: tar -cJf application.source.xz index.js package.json package-lock.json && mkdir -p dist && mv application.source.xz dist/
scripts.dist:zip: zip application.zip index.js package.json package-lock.json && mkdir -p dist && mv application.zip dist/
